Html:
Hi, 
 Can we use CLINQ with Silverlight 2.0? I tried porting the code but some of the .Net classes and lib are not recognised by SL Classlibrary project.

Many Thanks,
Mahesh
Making it available in Silverlight has always been something that I wanted to do...maybe now that 2.0 is in the can I'll take another look at what it might take to make it feasible.
